name: Snack for cat
title: Felix Purina · Snack for cat · Chicken, duck
description: Felix Snack for cat Chicken, duck

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition: Meat and animal derivatives (50% of which 19% chicken, 4% duck), cereals, oils and fats, vegetable protein extracts, minerals, yeasts.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives: Nutritional Additives: IU/kg : Vitamin A : 32000; Vitamin D3 : 1040; Vitamin E : 170 mg/kg : Iron (II) sulphate monohydrate : (Fe: 85); Calcium iodate anhydrous : (I: 1,3); Copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate : (Cu: 8,9); Manganous sulphate monohydrate : (Mn: 31); Zinc sulphate monohydrate : (Zn: 78); Sodium selenite : (Se: 0,092). antioxidants, preservatives.

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide: Clean, fresh drinking water should always be available. For your cat's health, respect the feeding guide, adjust your main meal accordingly, and exercise him daily. Supervise your cat when giving him/her the treat.

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complementary pet food for adult cats.
otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.
